name: Jolly Factory
description:
Welcome to Jolly Factory, a game about building presents.

Can you make enough presents until christmas comes? Be careful, as demand rises each year, so does the factory get larger. 

Your goal is to upgrade presents to Blue, Red or Yellow Presents produce more Holiday Cheer.

You can Rotate Machines by dragging them in a direction when placing them, or editing them with the grab tool.

The Camera is controlled with WASD, QE and RF.
